means: 1。[口]打败，胜过( best的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In every game they were bested by their opponents.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一场比赛他们都被对方击败.

sentence.Network_en: For three summers , may bested and improved their gliders.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们花了三个夏天不断地测试、改进.

sentence.Network_en: Nixon was not about to be bested by Brezhnev in philosophical discourse, however.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而尼克松不愿在勃列日涅夫的富于哲理的讲话面前甘拜下风.
